alert.note: Alert for Eastern Antelope Valley Foothills; Western Antelope Valley Foothills (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued March 10 at 2:34PM PST until March 10 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 40 mph with gusts up to 65 mph. * WHERE...Western Antelope Valley Foothills and Eastern Antelope Valley Foothills. * WHEN...Until 10 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Roadways that could be affected by damaging wind gusts include Highways 14 and 138 near the foothills. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Antelope Valley Foothills; Western Antelope Valley Foothills
